alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:33PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Itasca, northwestern Aitkin, east central Cass and northeastern Crow Wing Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 933 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wabedo, or 22 miles southeast of Walker, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Remer around 955 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lake Roosevelt, Lower Hay Lake, Washburn Lake, Lake Ada, Little Pine, White Elk Lake, Esquagamah Lake, Thunder Lake, Swanburg and Lower Whitefish Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
